name: Dr.Smiley's Brain Jam Party
description:
My entry for the GMC Jam's 10-year-anniversary jam! Made in 72 hours. The jam had the theme "One Big Party".

A puzzle crossover party game! Match lines and colors in a chaotic sensory overload as the number of rules in play steadily rises. Use bombs, fireworks and wildcards wisely as the difficulty ramps up, and set off a chain reaction that utilizes all available rule sets!

I kinda gave up two days in after realizing this concept just doesn't work in practice, so it's not too in-depth. Sorry for the inconvenience.
